MajorClaims.MC1: using single language through out the world is a positive change which is helping the world to become a better place to live
MajorClaims.MC2: change is inevitable and that usage of one language across the world is a positive one

Claims.C1: Communication in single language would improve the productivity of the world and brings everyone on to the same page
Claims.C2: A world with fewer languages helps us interact with each other in a better way
Claims.C3: few people are worried about the dying local languages

Premises.P1: Due to globalization, many people are traveling for professional trips
Premises.P2: communicating in single language will reduce the problems of travelers in daily activities like ordering food in a restaurant or in going around places
Premises.P3: students who migrate for better education would not have to go through lot of stress
Premises.P4: they can easily make new friends and can be part of any discussions which is otherwise not possible in a world with multiple languages; this in turn makes it easy to adjust in new environment
Premises.P5: Single language also reduces misunderstandings between people
Premises.P6: exchange of knowledge in different sectors of research like electronics, medical, astronomy etc would become easier
Premises.P7: These languages are the basis for the origination and initial communication between different cultures
Premises.P9: As the usage of these languages decrease, culture also changes accordingly
Premises.P10: these languages are tightly coupled with history; all the olden day literature and scripts will be impossible to decipher if these languages are lost
